Merge pull request #41 from samtstern/master

Version 0.2.0, redo settings dialog

Do not require PermissionCallbacks (#31)

* Made the PermissionCallbacks optional

* Made the PermissionCallbacks optional

* Documentation updated to reflect the non-requirement of PermissionCallbacks

Use start activity for result to start app settings (#27)

Squashed commits:

* Add negative button on click listener. So, user can do something if canceled.
* Update example
* Start activity for result instead of start activity. Use object's method for calling startActivityForResult
* Update example
* Update settings req code
* Update javadoc

* Update readme to handle negative button click listener
* Update onActivityResult sample code
* Revert back the action in MainActivity
* Use getString only, since it supports format
